Cratebox

Reactive State Management Library for no particular UI Library

Get Started →

Simple

With minimalism in mind, the exposed API will give you everything that you need without any headaches.

Typed

Built with types in mind you will be able to type your store to create a rock-solid model with type-safe checks.

Opinionated

You won't have to worry about how to structure and deal with complicated stuff.

# Quickstart

import { cratebox, types } from 'cratebox';

const crate = cratebox();

crate.describeStore({
  identifier: 'user',
  model: {
    name: types.string,
    lastName: types.string
  }
});
